title: Marketing & Design Internship — Do Real Work, Build Real Skills
description:
- Devoteam empowers organizations to accelerate their progress by leveraging the latest advancements in cloud, data, AI, and modern digital services. We go beyond buzzwords to deliver meaningful, hands-on impact through our specialized entities: Google Cloud, ServiceNow Platform, and Creative Tech Sweden.


Our Swedish offices in Stockholm, Gothenburg, and Malmö are part of our Nordic setup : ambitious, collaborative, and focused on outcomes. We make decisions quickly, we support each other across teams, and we expect everyone to contribute with real ownership.


If you want to be part of a place where learning is fast, responsibility is real, and your work actually matters, you’ll fit in here.

  
We are seeking a Marketing & Design Intern to join our team from February to May 2026 in our Stockholm, Gothenburg, or Malmö office.


This role is for someone who’s good with visual content and wants to learn how B2B marketing works in a fast-moving tech company.


**You’ll work on:**

* Visual assets for campaigns, sales enablement, and social channels
* Short video editing for LinkedIn, internal comms, and events
* Event materials (slides, banners, invites, etc.)
* Landing page visuals and simple web content updates
* Supporting live and digital campaigns across the Nordic region

You’ll be involved in real meetings, get regular feedback, and be expected to contribute from week one.


  
We’re looking for someone who:


* Is studying (or just finished) design, marketing, communications, or something related
* Has experience with Figma, Canva, Adobe, CapCut, or similar tools
* Has a basic understanding of digital campaigns, especially in B2B
* Can share some kind of portfolio or example work
* Is reliable, proactive, and communicates clearly
* Works well in English (Swedish, Norwegian, or Danish is a plus)

This internship is design- and execution-focused — not strategy or planning.


  
- * **Unpaid internship, based in Stockholm, Gothenburg, or Malmö**
	* Start date: First week of February
	* Duration: Feb to May 2026
	* On-site 2–3 days per week, with flexibility**What you’ll leave with:**


	* Real-world experience in design, content creation, and campaign execution
	* A portfolio that shows actual, meaningful work
	* A reference that counts — and possibly a full-time opportunity if there’s a mutual fit**How to Apply**

**Send us:**


	* Your CV
	* A few examples of your work (portfolio link or files — doesn’t need to be fancy)
	A short note answering:
	* Why is this the right internship for you, and what work do you want to focus on?We don’t care about fancy templates — we care about what you can do.

title: BDR Internship — Do the Work, Learn the Game
description:
- Devoteam empowers organizations to accelerate their progress by leveraging the latest advancements in cloud, data, AI, and modern digital services. We go beyond buzzwords to deliver meaningful, hands-on impact through our specialized entities: Google Cloud, ServiceNow Platform, and Creative Tech Sweden.


Our Swedish offices in Stockholm, Gothenburg, and Malmö are part of our Nordic setup : ambitious, collaborative, and focused on outcomes. We make decisions quickly, we support each other across teams, and we expect everyone to contribute with real ownership.


If you want to be part of a place where learning is fast, responsibility is real, and your work actually matters, you’ll fit in here.

  
This internship is for someone who wants to build real sales skills — not for someone looking to just “gain experience.” You’ll learn how modern tech companies grow through sales, outreach, market research, and customer engagement. You’ll support the sales and marketing efforts across our Google Cloud, ServiceNow, and Creative Tech teams, gaining exposure to three of the most in-demand areas in the industry.


**Here’s what you’ll actually do:**

* Research companies, accounts, and contacts — and learn to tell a good lead from a waste of time
* Write personalised outreach messages that don’t sound like everyone else’s
* Support early lead qualification and help structure and maintain our pipeline and tools
* Join team meetings, contribute actively, and track your progress like any other member of the team
* Learn how cloud, AI, digital workflows, and product design solve real business problems
Build a network across three specialised tech domains within Devoteam  
* 

No coffee runs. No busywork. You’ll be part of the team and expected to grow fast.


  
We’re hiring mindset over CV. We want someone who communicates well, learns fast, and takes initiative.


**You’ll need:**

* Clear, confident communication in English (Swedish is a plus).
* Curiosity about tech, sales, cloud, AI, service management, and digital experiences.
* Ability to follow up — with leads, teammates, and your own tasks.
* A proactive, “give me the ball” attitude.
Motivation to improve quickly and take ownership.  
* 

You're probably studying business, marketing, or tech — or maybe you're not. That’s less important than how you show up.


  
- * **Unpaid internship, based in Stockholm, Gothenburg, or Malmö**
	* **Start date:** First week of February
	* **Duration** : Feb to May 2026
	Work closely with senior sales teams across all three Devoteam entities  
	***What you’ll leave with:**


	* Sales skills you won’t learn in a lecture hall
	* Actual experience with outreach, pipeline, and customer work
	* A reference worth something (if you do the work)
	* A shot at staying — or at least, knowing what kind of team you want next**How to apply:**  

**Send us:**


	* Your CV
	A short note answering one question:* Why should we take a bet on you?Skip the formalities. We care what you bring, not how pretty your template is.

title: Manager, Partner Solution Consulting – EMEA NORTH
description:
**Company Description**  

It all started in sunny San Diego, California in 2004 when a visionary engineer, Fred Luddy, saw the potential to transform how we work. Fast forward to today — ServiceNow stands as a global market leader, bringing innovative AI-enhanced technology to over 8,100 customers, including 85% of the Fortune 500®. Our intelligent cloud-based platform seamlessly connects people, systems, and processes to empower organizations to find smarter, faster, and better ways to work. But this is just the beginning of our journey. Join us as we pursue our purpose to make the world work better for everyone.

 **Job Description** **About the role**


We are looking for an experienced and inspirational leader to join ServiceNow and manager the Partner Solution Consulting (PSC) team for EMEA NORTH. You will lead a diverse team of Partner Solution Consultants across multiple countries, driving strategic engagements with our partner ecosystem and supporting demand generation and pipeline growth.

 **What you’ll do**

* Lead, coach, and inspire a multicultural pre-sales team from early career to senior consultants.
* Drive the evolution of our partner ecosystem to be AI-native.
* Lead partner Ready-to-Sell enablement and capacity-building initiatives aligned with EMEA South GPC strategies while adapting to regional needs to maximize growth and customer success.
* Support partners’ go-to-market execution and joint pipeline generation across EMEA South.
* Collaborate with Global Partner & Channel (GPC) leadership, Sales, Pre-Sales, and Marketing to prioritize efforts and scale partner impact.
* Represent ServiceNow with strategic partners and executive stakeholders as a trusted advisor.
* Support team members’ career development and align growth plans with business objectives.
* Monitor and report on Partner SC engagement, workload, KPIs, and ROI, identifying opportunities to optimize and scale.
* Ensure high levels of partner and stakeholder satisfaction through consistent communication and engagement levels.

 **Qualifications** **What we’re looking for**

* Experience in leveraging or critically thinking about how to integrate AI into work processes, decision-making, or problem-solving. This may include using AI-powered tools, automating workflows, analyzing AI-driven insights, or exploring AI's potential impact on the function or industry.
* 8+ years of pre-sales or solution consulting experience, ideally in CRM, AI, or related cloud industries.
* 3+ years managing partner-facing or pre-sales teams.
* Proficiency with ServiceNow AI business transformation platform or technical expertise in cloud software solutions.
* Experience with Global/Regional System Integrators, Service Providers, or Advisory firms.
* Strong leadership, coaching, and team-building skills; experience managing multicultural, distributed teams.
* Data-driven, structured management style focused on outcomes and continuous improvement.
* Proven ability to collaborate across Sales, Pre-Sales, Partner, Marketing, and Product teams to maximize partner impact.
* Excellent communication and storytelling skills for both technical and executive audiences.
* Fluency in English; additional European languages are a plus

**Why join us?**


This is a unique opportunity to lead at the intersection of partner strategy, technology innovation, and business growth. If you are passionate about enabling partners, developing talent, and making an impact across a diverse region, we would love to hear from you.

 **Additional Information** **Work Personas**


We approach our distributed world of work with flexibility and trust. Work personas (flexible, remote, or required in office) are categories that are assigned to ServiceNow employees depending on the nature of their work and their assigned work location. Learn more here. To determine eligibility for a work persona, ServiceNow may confirm the distance between your primary residence and the closest ServiceNow office using a third-party service.

**Equal Opportunity Employer**


ServiceNow is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, creed, religion, sex, sexual orientation, national origin or nationality, ancestry, age, disability, gender identity or expression, marital status, veteran status, or any other category protected by law. In addition, all qualified applicants with arrest or conviction records will be considered for employment in accordance with legal requirements.

**Accommodations**


We strive to create an accessible and inclusive experience for all candidates. If you require a reasonable accommodation to complete any part of the application process, or are unable to use this online application and need an alternative method to apply, please contact globaltalentss@servicenow.com for assistance.

**Export Control Regulations**


For positions requiring access to controlled technology subject to export control regulations, including the U.S. Export Administration Regulations (EAR), ServiceNow may be required to obtain export control approval from government authorities for certain individuals. All employment is contingent upon ServiceNow obtaining any export license or other approval that may be required by relevant export control authorities.


From Fortune. ©2025 Fortune Media IP Limited. All rights reserved. Used under license.
company_description: At ServiceNow, our technology makes the world work for everyone, and our people make it possible.

title: PACS Sales Engineer
description:
**An Amazing Career Opportunity for a Sales Engineer III!!**
**Location:** Remote, US
**Job ID:** 43954  



HID Global is seeking tech-savvy Sales engineer passionate about solving problem, driving customer success, bridging innovation with business outcomes within the PACA NAM Sales team! As part of our team, you will work with regional sales manager and vertical business development managers in the territory to promote HID PACS products and services. As our Sales Engineer, you are responsible for interacting with clients to understand their needs and priorities and matching those priorities with our PACS offers. As a sales engineer, you possess excellent communication skills, articulate complex technical information concisely and foster impactful customer relationship. If you’re looking for a challenge, we would love to have you!  


**Who are we?**  



HID powers the trusted identities of the world’s people, places, and things, allowing people to transact safely, work productively and travel freely.
We are a high-tech software company headquartered in Austin, TX, with over 4,500 worldwide employees. Check us out here: www.hidglobal.com and https://youtu.be/23km5H4K9Eo  

**Physical Access Control Solutions (PACS):**

HID Physical Access Control Solutions (PACS) is at the forefront of securing spaces with advanced, reliable access control solutions. From cutting-edge readers, credentials and controllers, to mobile and biometric technologies, HID PACS empowers organizations worldwide to protect their people, property and assets with scalable, high-quality solutions.

This is more than just a job – it’s your chance to join an industry leader to drive innovation in access control and make a real impact on global security solutions.  



Are you ready to make a difference? Join us and help shape the future of security.  


**As our Sales Engineer III, you’ll support HID’s success by:**
* Acting as the Sales team's technical encyclopedia during the sale cycle, representing the technical aspects of how the product solves specific customer problems.
* Assisting our customers, partners, and internal sales force with all aspects of a sale focusing on the technical aspects of the HID PACS Solutions, Product and Services.
* Providing timely assistance responses to create technically sound solutions, while educating our customers, thus increasing the probability of success, and decreasing the time to success.
* Building trusting relationships with technology decision-makers and influencers. Gaining a deep understanding of the channel partners’ technology and business strategy.
* Organize demos and POC to properly represent HID during seminars, conferences and tradeshows.
* Providing technical training to partners and end users on HID-specific technologies, tools and relevant industry topics related to Credential Technologies, Access Control Hardware, Mobile Access Solutions, Biometric Authentication, AI & Machine Learning integration and others.
* Collaborating with HID Product Marketing and Engineering teams on the requirements and perspectives of our customers. Improve HID’s portfolio by providing regular partner feedback to internal cross-functional teams including Product Management.
* Maintaining a strong technical command of the HID portfolio. Ability to learn new technical concepts by leveraging internal experts and external resources such as field experts and technical articles.
* Providing timely assistance to peers and coaching to junior team member to ensure team success.

  


**Your Experience and Background include:**
* Bachelor's degree in a technical field such as IT, Science or Engineering or equivalent work experience.
* Minimum 4 - 5 years of Technical or Presales experience supporting an Physical Access Control Technology/Solution desired.
* Minimum 2 – 3 years of in-depth HID PACS Products and Services experience required.
* ASIS PSP, CSEIP, CISSP certified or other PACS Domain certifications preferred.
* Understanding of PACS system and components such as:
	+ Directory services (Active Directory, LDAP, X.500);
	+ Databases (Microsoft SQL and/or Oracle);
	+ Network protocols (SSL/TLS, HTTPS, MQTT, RADIUS);
	+ Authentication protocols (SAML, OAuth, OIDC);
	+ Network security (Firewalls, DMZ, VPN);
	+ Cloud integrations (RESTful APIs, SDK),
	+ Encryption standards (AES, RSA, ECC, PQC), and device provisioning workflows.
* Knowledge of industry standards such as OSDP, Wiegand, ISO/IEC 14443, ISO15693, UL294, AES, FICAM, PSIA and mobile access technologies.
* Structure and representation of digital information (bits, bytes, MSB/LSB, JSON, CSV etc.)
* Knowledge of vertical-specific PACS requirements and compliance standards.
* Excellent industry knowledge and a willingness to keep up with trends.
* Excellent communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills.
* Ability to manage multiple priorities and work effectively in a matrixed organization.
* Strong technical aptitude and able to convey and understand technical concepts.
* Being able to dig deep into the world of bits and bytes to solve customer issues
* Understanding and experience of the access control and/or IT sales channel market preferred.
* Enjoys working on a remote team with multiple account managers, partners, and customers throughout the region.

  


**What we can offer you:**
* Competitive salary and rewards package
* Competitive benefits and annual leave offering, allowing for work-life balance
* A vibrant, welcoming & inclusive culture
* Extensive career development opportunities and resources to maximize your potential
* To be a part of a global organization that is pioneering the hardware, software and services that allow people to confidently navigate the physical and digital worlds

  


**Why apply?**
* **Empowerment:** You’ll work as part of a global team in a flexible work environment, learning and enhancing your expertise. We welcome an opportunity to meet you and learn about your unique talents, skills, and experiences. You don’t need to check all the boxes. If you have most of the skills and experience, we want you to apply.
* **Innovation:** You embrace challenges and want to drive change. We are open to ideas, including flexible work arrangements, job sharing or part-time job seekers.
* **Integrity:** You are results-orientated, reliable, and straightforward and value being treated accordingly. We want all our employees to be themselves, to feel appreciated and accepted.

  



The wage range for this role considers a broad scope of factors that are considered when making compensation decisions, including but not limited to: skill sets, experience and training, licensure and certifications, and other business and organizational needs. The disclosed range does not account for geographic differentials based on the location where the position may be filled. At HID, it is uncommon for individuals to be hired at or near the top of the range. Final compensation decisions depend on the specific facts and circumstances of each case.  



The base salary in the United States is $88,000 to $120,000. The OTE is up to $150,000.  



HID does not accept unsolicited resumes from headhunters, recruitment agencies, or fee-based recruitment services. We are not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes.  



HID is committed to building a diverse, equitable, and inclusive workforce that reflects the global communities we serve. As an equal opportunity employer, we welcome applications from individuals of all backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives. We evaluate applicants without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, disability, age, veteran status, or any other legally protected characteristic. Our goal is to create a workplace that empowers everyone to thrive and be their authentic selves, fostering an environment of mutual respect and inclusivity. If you have a disability and require assistance or accommodation to participate in the application process or to perform essential job functions, please contact accommodations-ext@hidglobal.com.  



Please be aware that our recruitment process may include the use of AI-powered tools to assist in screening applicant resumes. These tools help us efficiently identify candidates whose qualifications and skills align with the job description. We use AI in a responsible manner and in accordance with applicable data privacy laws and regulations. Importantly, all applicants are reviewed by our Talent Acquisition team. AI is used to support, not replace, human judgment in the evaluation process.  


**We make it easier for people to get where they want to go!**  

On an average day, think of how many times you tap, twist, tag, push or swipe to get access, find information, connect with others or track something. HID technology is behind billions of interactions, in more than 100 countries. We help you create a verified, trusted identity that can get you where you need to go – without having to think about it.  

  

When you join our HID team, you’ll also be part of the ASSA ABLOY Group, the global leader in access solutions. You’ll have 63,000 colleagues in more than 70 different countries. We empower our people to build their career around their aspirations and our ambitions – supporting them with regular feedback, training, and development opportunities. Our colleagues think broadly about where they can make the most impact, and we encourage them to grow their role locally, regionally, or even internationally. As we welcome new people on board, it’s important to us to have diverse, inclusive teams, and we value different perspectives and experiences.
 #LI-HIDGlobal

title: Senior Services Owner
description:
**Do you want to be at the forefront of protecting our society against cyber threats? We are looking for a Senior Service Owner to lead our flagship Managed Detection & Response (MDR) service, combining cutting-edge cloud technology with expert SOC operations to deliver best-in-class cybersecurity protection for our customers in our Managed Security Services domain.**

##### **About Truesec – A Leading Cybersecurity Company**


Since 2005, Truesec has been a native cybersecurity company, driven by one single purpose: Creating safety and sustainability in a digital world by preventing cyber breach and minimizing impact.


Over the years, we’ve earned the trust of organizations worldwide and gained a strong reputation internationally. Our team consists of dedicated specialists covering the entire spectrum of cybersecurity – with capabilities in Predict, Prevent, Protect, Respond, and Recover.


Today, we employ around 350 employees – and as cybercrime grows, we need to grow. To support that goal, we are now looking for a Senior Services Owner who wants to make a difference in our Managed Security Services domain.

##### **Managed Security Services**


Truesec helps customers globally with Managed Detection & Response including Attack Prediction Services, Vulnerability Management Services for both IT and OT environment. Our services are all delivered by skilled security analysis teams that conduct 24/7 attack monitoring, threat hunting, threat intelligence analysis, and threat remediation. Our team of experts works tirelessly to identify and prevent cyber breaches, and to help increase our customers’ proactive cybersecurity defenses. Our goal is to be an extension of our customers’ IT organizations, customizing a combination of capabilities and tooling, tailored to prevent cyber attacks in the most efficient way.

##### **The Role**


You'll drive the evolution of our established MDR service, accelerating development to meet emerging customer needs and support our expansion, with particular focus on the Nordic markets. Working at the intersection of our cloud platform and SOC operations, you'll shape the future of how we detect and respond to cyber threats at scale while enabling our go-to-market teams to succeed across European markets.

**Key Responsibilities**

* Collaborate to develop and execute the MDR services strategy and roadmap, ensuring alignment with business objectives and evolving market demands.
* Engage with customers to deeply understand needs, pain points, and opportunities for service enhancement.
* Partner with engineering teams and SOC leadership to optimize workflows, service delivery, and platform development.
* Monitor the cybersecurity landscape, competitor offerings, and market trends to identify strategic opportunities.
* Work closely with sales and marketing teams to support growth efforts, including creating compelling content and developing go-to-market strategies.
* Define and track key metrics for service performance, operational efficiency, and customer success.
* Foster collaboration between technology and human-driven SOC operations to ensure operational excellence.

##### **Your Potential Background**

* 10+ years of IT-service management experience with a track record in B2B products or services (cybersecurity, SaaS, or service-oriented industries).
* Strong problem-solving and analytical skills along with technical skills.
* Experience within MDR, SOC operations, and cybersecurity.
* Experience supporting go-to-market teams, familiarity with European and Nordic markets is a plus.
* Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to translate complex concepts for diverse audiences.
* Fluency in English; Nordic languages are an advantage but not mandatory.

**Impact**


You'll play a pivotal role in shaping the future of our most strategic service, directly influencing how we protect organizations across Europe from cyber threats. Your work will drive both customer success and company growth as we expand our presence in the Nordic region and strengthen our position as a leader in the European market.

***Due to the sensitivity in our assignments, we require Swedish citizenship, citizenship in an EU country, or a Swedish work permit.***

##### **Join Our Mission Toward a Safe Digital Future**


If you truly want to make a difference and make our world a little bit safer, this is the place for you. At Truesec, you'll get to be at the forefront of fighting cybercrime instead of reading about it in the news. This is your chance to be part of an exciting journey in a leading cybersecurity company - and learn from some of the best in their field.


So, are you ready to team up with the most dedicated team of experts and be part of a meaningful mission? Then we are excited to get to know you!

title: Management Consultant / Manager - CFO&EV SE
description:
**Are you a true team player who wants to be part of an organization that strives to make a difference by innovating with a purpose? Are you highly motivated to own the data-oriented future of finance together with our clients?**


Accenture’s CFO & Enterprise Value team would like to hear from you!


As part of Accenture CFO & Enterprise Value you will help organizations to unlock their potential and make Reinvention part of your career.  

  

We are looking for a**Strategy****and****Consulting****Consultant or****Manager** for our **CFO & Enterprise Value**team in Stockholm.  

  

To succeed in the role you are a driven, ambitious, and proactive leader who enjoys drawing and explaining the bigger picture, while still having a practical approach and expertise. You will drive business development efforts and identify new opportunities as well as ensure successful project delivery and client satisfaction.  

  

**What****you****will****do**

* Integrated finance operating model and shared service center design and establishment
* Finance platform transformation and organization restructuring
* Strategic finance operations with finance process development and optimization
* Automation projects of finance processes including AI/GenAI/Agentic AI
* Enterprise performance management including budgeting, planning, and forecasting development
* Performance management design and development
* Strategic cost reduction and operational efficiency
* Pricing strategies
**What´s in it for you**

* Truly competitive salary terms, bonus schemes, pension, health insurance, employee stock purchase program etc.
* Work-life balance is important to us. Volunteer roles and events through our internal networks
* Access to several social activities through active corporate sports community
* Monthly community meetings with a focus on personal and professional development
* A variety of formal and informal training programs at every level to help you acquire and build specialized skills faster

  

**To success in this role, we believe you have:**

* A Master’s degree in a relevant field, e.g. Accounting, Finance or Industrial Engineering with excellent academic performance
* 5 + years of strategy and/or management consulting experience related to the CFO Agenda (e.g., finance transformation, enterprise performance management, finance operating model, platform transformation) that impacts the finance functions in various organizations.
* Experience from diverse projects and teams
* Fluent in English (incl. experience with written and oral presentations in English) and Swedish, conducting interviews and workshops facilitation
**The position will report to CFO & EV Lead and workplace is****Stockholm****,****Sweden****. Some****travel****should be expected.**

**Interested****?**


Apply online by attaching your CV, application letter and educational diplomas as soon as possible. **We look forward to receiving your application.**

 **Please expect some delay in the process due to Christmas holiday!**

 **About CFO & EV in Accenture**


We provide end-to-end services to address the unique challenges faced by Finance Executives to help develop and lead a more efficient and effective Finance function, enabling more data-driven insights, enterprise innovation and creating new value in a digital world.


We are looking to enhance our team to engage them in areas of:

**Enterprise performance management**– Develop integrated, cloud-enabled, planning and enterprise performance analysis capabilities that will enhance strategic insights and accelerate business decisions.

**Finance operations**– Ensure business continuity and de-risk the organization in a downturn economy through an agile operating model in which high-performance Finance & Accounting can be delivered anytime, anywhere.

**Finance Platform Transformation** – Help finance organizations secure the opportunity to take their system implementation to the next level by developing harmonized and standard processes and streamlining their data models.

**Enterprise Value** – Identify and realize value for the enterprise and help drive measurable outcomes through digital investments at the right pace and scale.

**Enterprise Analytics** – Help CFOs to become more data-driven to provide insights enabling true business partnering in Finance required for sustainable growth and decision-making

**Automation and AI** – Help organizations become leading edge companies utilizing generative AI, process- and task mining

title: Senior Test Automation Engineer
description:
**At Together Tech, we develop tech solutions! We foster an inclusive and dynamic workplace and encourage our employees to combine the strong technical knowledge with the desire to push boundaries for creating a better tomorrow.**

  

Join our Mobility team as a Senior Test Automation Engineer and take a central role in shaping the future of next-generation digital and connected vehicle solutions. You will work in long-term assignments with our leading automotive clients, contributing to system quality, test automation, and innovation. In this role, you will collaborate closely with skilled teams, drive improvements across complex systems, and ensure high standards in every phase of the development lifecycle. Your Responsibilities:

* Develop and drive test automation strategies with a focus on agile principles and methodologies.
* Create and maintain frameworks to automate manual tests, including exploratory testing, integration tests, and UI tests.
* Investigate and troubleshoot issues across systems, integrations, and APIs.
* Contribute to the improvement of monitoring and quality assurance processes for existing services.
* Support CI/CD pipelines, including automated testing in environments.
* Drive quality across microservices, API, and cloud-based services

**Your technical bakgrund**

* Master's/Bachelor’s degree in computer science or a related field.
* At least 5 years of hands-on experience in system testing or similar roles, with a strong background in digital services and microservices architectures.
* Expertise in automation frameworks and API testing(e.g., Insomnia, Postman), and experience with UI test automation tools such as Cypress, Playwright or Selenium
* Strong programming skills in Java (skills in TypeScript, HTML, CSS, and Python are a plus)
* Experience with cloud platforms such as AWS or Azure (Terraform and CloudFormation are a plus).
* Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines e.g., Jenkins, GitHub.
* Experience with Docker and containerized environments (Kubernetes is a plus).
* Good command of written and spoken English, Swedish is a plus.

**Your personal characteristics**  

Being a consultant puts extra light on having a flexible and curious mindset, a self-reliant way of working and your capability to build strong relationships with customers and colleagues, while keeping track of the target picture. You stay current with industry trends and emerging technologies and are motivated to develop together with us.

  


**Together Tech for sustainability**  

We provide opportunities for development through a variety of assignments in different industries, whether it be client projects or in one of our exciting in-house projects. At Together Tech, you work together with other engineers who are passionate about the environment and sustainability, all with a desire to create lasting solutions using technology - or as we say: Better World Tech!

**Your development & our support**

  

Your development and well-being are important to us, and Together Tech offers benefits that support you and your career in the best way. We value the importance of secure employment and fixed salary, and we have a collective agreement. We prioritize your health and provide a wellness allowance of 4000 SEK per year. Moreover, we offer health check-ups, contributions to activities, and wellness discounts.


We enjoy spending time together through various social activities and team-building activities suitable for everyone! From after-works and sport activities to pentathlons and corporate conferences. Our commitment is to give you great conditions to grow through various assignments and projects as well as individual development plans. We also offer courses in sustainability and other courses within the framework of your role and goals. We take pride in being recognized as one of Sweden's most attractive employers in 2024, 2025 and 2026 by Karriärföretagen!

  



Learn more about us at www.togethertech.com.


For questions regarding the position, please contact Consultant Manager Claes Jonsson, on +46700 889 729.

title: Master’s thesis; Mitigating model evasion attacks for robust LLM-based intrusion detection
description:
**About RISE**  

RISE Research Institutes of Sweden AB is a research organization owned by the Swedish government. This thesis will be conducted within the RISE Cybersecurity Unit, which is among the largest publicsector cybersecurity research groups in Sweden. Our core areas of expertise are: IoT Security, Cloud Security, Network & Communication Security, Access Control, Privacy (technical and social aspects), and Secure Virtualization and Trusted Computing. The RISE Cybersecurity Unit is the European leader in IoT security research & development. In additional to a strong research environment, RISE


Cybersecurity is the owner of the RISE Cyber Range, a cybersecurity test and demo facility in Kista with a critical infrastructure grade security, that provides a trusted place for Swedish industry to understand and address their cybersecurity needs. RISE Cyber Range, in addition to providing practical cybersecurity education, training and exercise, is an environment for state-of-the-art cybersecurity research and development.

**Background**  

Large Language Model–based Intrusion Detection Systems (LLM-based NIDS) are emerging as a new approach for analyzing network traffic and identifying suspicious or malicious activities. By leveraging the contextual modeling capabilities of LLMs, these systems can detect complex or previously unseen attack patterns, generate detailed alerts, and support automated responses such as blocking malicious flows or isolating compromised hosts. While LLM-based NIDS offer improved adaptability and semantic understanding compared to traditional ML models, they also introduce new security challenges. In particular, the models themselves may become targets of adversarial manipulation, where carefully crafted inputs are designed to evade detection—raising significant concerns regarding model-evasion attacks and the robustness of these systems in real-world deployments.

**Thesis description**  

This project aims to investigate the robustness of LLM-based NIDS against emerging model-evasion attacks. While several studies have explored adversarial threats in intrusion detection, current defensive approaches remain insufficient: they are computationally expensive, provide only narrow or limited robustness guarantees, are susceptible to adaptive adversaries, and frequently rely on evaluation methodologies that overestimate practical resilience. As large language models continue to advance and become more deeply integrated into security analytics, the attack surface is expected to expand, making robust defenses even more critical. To address these gaps, this research will develop new adversarial training strategies that adaptively select or generate context-aware training instances and rigorously evaluate defensive effectiveness under realistic operational scenarios. A successful candidate will have the opportunity to contribute to European Research & Development security projects.


RISE will provide the necessary background information and guidance throughout the completion of the Master’s thesis. The student's tasks for this project will include:


* Conducting a comprehensive study on state-of-the-art defence techniques against model evasion attacks on LLM-based IDSs.
* Assessing the effectiveness of the defence techniques.
* Design and implement novel techniques that can practically defend against novel model evasion attacks.
* Conducting experimental evaluations of the developed solutions in a laboratory environment.
* Documenting all activities and outcomes of the research in the form of a comprehensive thesis report.

**Student profile**  

We are looking for an ambitious MSc student who has fulfilled the course requirements. Good programming skills in Python are required, as is good spoken and written English. Experience with machine learning, LLM, and network security is a plus. Applications should include a brief personal statement, a CV, and a list of grades. The application has to mention previous activities or other projects that are relevant for the position.

  

This thesis will be conducted within the RISE Cybersecurity Unit in Kista, Stockholm.  

  



**Terms**

* The thesis project is expected to be carried out during Spring 2026. The duration of the work is about 20 weeks.
* Credits: 30 ECTS in agreement with your thesis advisor at your university.
* Compensation: 39,990 SEK after the project is completed and approved.
* Location: RISE, Kista. Option to partially work remotely.

**Welcome with your application**  

Candidates are encouraged to send their application as soon as possible. Suitable applicants will be interviewed as applications are received.  

  

If you want to know more, please contact Han Wang (han.wang@ri.se). Last day of application is January 6, 2026.

title: Kundansvarig säljare med fokus på Hybrid Cloud
description:
#### **Vi är JSC. Vi älskar att se andra lyckas!**

På JSC strävar vi efter att bli så individuellt framgångsrika som möjligt, men inte på bekostnad av varandra – prestigelöst delar vi med oss av vår tid och kunskap till våra kollegor och gläds åt varandras framgångar. Samtidigt vågar vi ha roligt och bjuda på oss själva utan rädsla för att tappa masken.  

Vi är övertygade om att människors inre drivkraft slår yttre påbud alla dagar i veckan. Därför sätter vi stor tillit till våra medarbetares omdöme och förmåga att fatta egna beslut. Vi vet även att arbete och privatliv samspelar och påverkar varandra. Våra medarbetare har därför den stora friheten och ansvaret att arbeta på det sätt som passar deras livssituation bäst.

#### **JSC Hybrid Cloud**


Inom JSC Hybrid Cloud levererar vi IT‑tjänster som hjälper våra kunder att göra bättre affärer. Med kunskap om molnet och fötterna på jorden ser vi till att kunderna har rätt lösning utifrån verksamhetens krav. Hybrid Cloud låter oss kombinera det bästa av både publika och privata moln för en skräddarsydd, kostnadseffektiv och säker driftsleverans. Med egen drift och djup kunskap om Microsoft Azure erbjuder vi den IT‑miljö som passar bäst—oavsett var den finns.

#### **Om tjänsten**


Som kundansvarig säljare med fokus på Hybrid Cloud ansvarar du för att bära ut JSC:s tjänster och skapa tydligt kundvärde i både befintliga och nya relationer. Uppdraget är jämnt fördelat mellan kundutveckling och nyförsäljning.

**Kundutveckling**  

Du är kundansvarig till utvalda befintliga konton och lär känna kundens verksamhet på djupet. Med utgångspunkt i deras mål identifierar du förbättringar i IT‑miljön och omsätter insikterna till konkreta initiativ som höjer säkerhet, effektivitet och kostnadskontroll. Du planerar gemensamma genomgångar, presenterar rekommenderade lösningar och säkrar smidiga införanden tillsammans med dina kollegor på JSC. Du följer upp leveranser och effekt, vårdar kundupplevelsen och utvecklar partnerskapet över tid så att värdet fortsätter öka.

**Nyförsäljning och bearbetning**  

Du driver ett strukturerat arbete mot marknaden: kvalificerar prospekt, genomför behovsanalys och bygger övertygande erbjudanden där våra Hybrid Cloud‑tjänster visar tydlig nytta. Du bokar och håller möten och demonstrationer, leder affärsdialogen från första kontakt till signerat avtal och säkerställer en sömlös överlämning till leverans. Genom hela processen samarbetar du med dina kollegor för att leveransen ska bli så bra som möjligt.


Du ingår i **skapa affärer‑teamet** på cirka tio personer där ni sätter strategier och budgetar tillsammans och hjälper varandra att lyckas.

#### **Vad vi söker hos dig**


Vi söker dig med dokumenterad erfarenhet av B2B‑försäljning, företrädesvis inom IT eller dig med gedigen erfarenhet av molnlösningar som vill ta nästa steg i en säljroll. Du har god förståelse för IT‑miljöer, är kommunikativ och relationsskapande, tar egna initiativ och driver affärer självständigt. Du håller dig uppdaterad genom omvärldsbevakning, utbildning och egna initiativ, och har ett starkt personligt driv att utvecklas och att utmana dig själv med nya kunskaper. Som person är du resultatorienterad och uthållig, ansvarstagande och engagerad. Du trivs i samarbeten, har god social kompetens och är nyfiken på nya teknologier—motiverad att växa i takt med branschens utveckling. Du är dessutom bekväm med att ta kontakt med nya människor och att förklara komplexa lösningar på ett enkelt, affärsnära sätt.

#### **Vårt erbjudande till dig**

Vi har modet att säga att medarbetarna är viktigare än kunderna, för vi är övertygade om att nöjda medarbetare skapar nöjda kunder. Som en del av vårt gäng får du därför tillgång till en rad olika förmåner. Frukost varje dag, ett maxat friskvårsbidrag och tjänstepension är bara några av dem. Hos oss har dessutom alla medarbetare, oavsett roll, möjlighet att skaffa förmånsbil. På JSC anpassar vi mål och förväntningar för att ge förutsättningar för våra medarbetare att utveckla sin kompetens, för vi älskar att se andra lyckas! Vi blev 2025 utsedda till Sveriges näst bästa arbetsplatser inom IT av Great Place To Work!

**Start:** Enligt överenskommelse  

**Lön:** Individuell lönesättning  

**Placering:** På vår mötesplats i Nässjö

title: Platform Engineer GCP
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.

 **Din profil (Skall krav)**  

* Minst 2 års erfarenhet av att ha arbetat som molntekniker, eller motsvarande inom molnplattformen GCP.
* Minst 1 tidigare uppdrag från att ha arbetat i en produktionsmiljö med molnplattformen GCP.
* Relevant akademisk utbildning eller annan dokumenterad kunskap inhämtad genom utbildningar, certifieringar eller erfarenhet.
* Minst 1 tidigare uppdrag inom cloudmigrering, alternativ nyuppsättning av en cloudmiljö såsom landingzone mm.
* God förmåga att uttrycka sig på svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.
* Minst 1 tidigare uppdrag från att ha arbetat med GKE

  

**Meriterande**  

* Erfarenhet och kunskap inom IaC och gärna cloud build.
* Erfarenhet och kunskap inom crossplane.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med Kubernetes
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med Envoy
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med EntraId
* Minst 1 uppdrag sedan innan där man har jobbat med PKI (Public Key Infrastructure)
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med moderna säkerhetsprinciper som Zero Trust, Least Privelege och DevSecOps.
* Erfarenhet av mer än ett (1) tidigare uppdrag av att ha arbetat med komplexa och transaktionsintensiva IT-miljöer mot B2C (som exempelvis inom detaljhandel, bank eller finans), med höga krav på tillgänglighet, konfidentialitet, riktighet, spårbarhet och tillgänglighet.

  

**Sista ansökningdatum:** 06-01-2026 **Om Oss**  

Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?

  

Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Här påverkar du din egen lön som helt och hållet som baseras på ditt timpris mot kund.


Vår lönemodell är en hybridlösning mellan en fast månadslön och en provisionsbaserad ersättning. Det innebär att din månadslön baseras på ditt timpris, fast om du mot förmodan skulle stå utan uppdrag så behåller du en grund lön fram tills vi hittat ett nytt uppdrag, bra va?

 **Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.


En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.


Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.


Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.


Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?


Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.

  

Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.


Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?  

  

*Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.*

title: Senior M365 Security Engineer
description:
**Do you want to be at the forefront of protecting our society against cyber threats? We are looking for a Senior M365 Security Engineer to team up with the most dedicated team of cyber specialists in our Secure Infrastructure domain.**

##### **About Truesec – A Leading Cybersecurity Company**


Since 2005, Truesec has been a native cybersecurity company, driven by one single purpose: Creating safety and sustainability in a digital world by preventing cyber breach and minimizing impact.


Over the years, we’ve earned the trust of organizations worldwide and gained a strong reputation internationally. Our team consists of dedicated specialists covering the entire spectrum of cybersecurity – with capabilities in Predict, Prevent, Protect, Respond, and Recover.


Today, we employ around 350 employees – and as cybercrime grows, we need to grow. To support that goal, we are now looking for a Senior M365 Security Engineer who wants to make a difference in our Secure Infrastructure domain.

##### **Secure Infrastructure**


Looking at the actual threat landscape today, it’s more important than ever to design and build infrastructure solutions that incorporate correct and relevant security features. The team works closely together using their combined knowledge and experience gathered from different projects and Incident Response cases to help our customers stay ahead of the threat actors. We continuously help customers improve their security posture within cloud, data center, endpoint management, identity, M365, and networking.

##### **The Role**


Truesec is seeking a Senior Microsoft 365 engineer for a full-time role in Stockholm or remote. The cloud engineer interfaces regularly with team members and customers, determines technical requirements, feasibility of projects and expectations. You are responsible for maintaining, implementing, and designing client-facing solutions primarily in M365 Security and Entra ID. This role is for someone who wants to be hands-on in a technical role leaning heavily towards Cloud and Cloud Security. You must be able to think on your feet and you’ve got to want to learn and be part of a highly skilled and innovative team. Other responsibilities you might have can be:

* Run health and security checks within M365 and Entra ID
* Provide customers recommendations and prioritization of how to improve their security posture over time.
* Implement solutions based on Statement of Work with customers

##### **Your Potential Background**


We believe that your background probably entails 5+ years of experience and expertise within the Microsoft public cloud, such as M365 Security, Intune and Entra ID, including troubleshooting, deploying, and configuring of said solutions. It's likely that you also have experience with hybrid environments, Conditional Access, and Azure Security.

**Required Skills:**

* Strong Experience of M365 Security platform
* Strong Experience of Entra ID
* Genuine interest of helping customers within Cybersecurity
* Ability to prioritize and create implementation plans for Customers

**Bonus Skills:**

* Experience within Client Management
* Understanding of M365 licensing
* Ability to script and automate
* Experience with hybrid environments

*Due to the sensitivity in our assignments, we require Swedish citizenship, citizenship in an EU country, or a Swedish work permit.*

##### **Join Our Mission Toward a Safe Digital Future**


If you truly want to make a difference and make our world a little bit safer, this is the place for you. At Truesec, you'll get to be at the forefront of fighting cybercrime instead of reading about it in the news. This is your chance to be part of an exciting journey in a leading cybersecurity company - and learn from some of the best in their field.


So, are you ready to team up with the most dedicated team of experts and be part of a meaningful mission? Then we are excited to get to know you!

title: Senior Security Infrastructure Engineer
description:
**Do you want to be at the forefront of protecting our society against cyber threats? We are looking for a Senior Security Infrastructure Engineer to team up with the most dedicated team of cyber specialists in our Secure Infrastructure domain.**

##### **About Truesec – A Leading Cybersecurity Company**


Since 2005, Truesec has been a native cybersecurity company, driven by one single purpose: Creating safety and sustainability in a digital world by preventing cyber breach and minimizing impact.


Over the years, we’ve earned the trust of organizations worldwide and gained a strong reputation internationally. Our team consists of dedicated specialists covering the entire spectrum of cybersecurity – with capabilities in Predict, Prevent, Protect, Respond, and Recover.


Today, we employ around 350 employees – and as cybercrime grows, we need to grow. To support that goal, we are now looking for a Senior Security Infrastructure Engineer who wants to create advanced security solutions in our Secure Infrastructure Domain.

##### **Secure Infrastructure**


Looking at the actual threat landscape today, it’s more important than ever to design and build infrastructure solutions that incorporate correct and relevant security features. The team works closely together using their combined knowledge and experience gathered from different projects and Incident Response cases to help our customers stay ahead of the threat actors. We continuously help customers improve their security posture within cloud, data center, endpoint management, identity, M365, and networking.

##### **The Role**


The Security engineer interfaces regularly with team members and customers, determine technical requirements, feasibility of projects and expectations. You are responsible for maintaining, implementing, and designing client-facing solutions primarily in Active Directory, Entra ID, Azure and Microsoft 365 Security Solutions. This role is for someone who wants to be hands-on in a Microsoft infrastructure role leaning towards cloud but with the experience and knowledge of On-premises/hybrid environments. You must be able to think on your feet and you’ve got to want to learn and be part of a highly skilled and innovative team.
  

  

Other responsibilities you might have can be:

* Run health and security checks on Active Directory, Microsoft 365 including Entra ID.
* Assisting our Customers with Tiering Projects.
* Provide customers with design and also assist with the actual implementation.
* Implement solutions based on Statement of Work with customers.

##### **Your Potential Background**


We believe that your background probably entails 7+ years of experience and expertise within Microsoft solutions for both Cloud and On-premise/hybrid environments. You feel comfortable with guiding stakeholders towards a more secure and robust environment by giving technical recommendations that can persist the current threats present today.
  

  

You are comfortable with guiding customers within areas such as: AD-Security, Entra ID-security, Windows Server Hardening, Azure security.

**Required Skills:**

* Active Directory Security
* Windows server Security
* Azure Security
* Microsoft 365 Security
* Overall a strong Cybersecurity competence within Microsoft Infrastructure.

**Bonus Skills:**

* Knowledge of scripting languages such as PowerShell and/or Python
* Cloud migration journeys from On-prem to Azure.
* Experience with Azure networking: Express Route, Virtual Network & Load Balancers
* Hypervisor knowledge of Hyper-V, VMware.
* Experience working with monitoring and logging tools (e.g.: Log Analytics, Azure Monitor, Azure Sentinel, ELK/ElasticSearch/Kibana)
* Experience with other cloud providers such as AWS and GCP.

*Due to the sensitivity in our assignments, we require Swedish citizenship, citizenship in an EU country, or a Swedish work permit.*

##### **Join Our Mission Toward a Safe Digital Future**


If you truly want to make a difference and make our world a little bit safer, this is the place for you. At Truesec, you'll get to be at the forefront of fighting cybercrime instead of reading about it in the news. This is your chance to be part of an exciting journey in a leading cybersecurity company - and learn from some of the best in their field.


So, are you ready to team up with the most dedicated team of experts and be part of a meaningful mission? Then we are excited to get to know you!

title: Platform Engineer GCP - Svenska Spel
description:
Platform Engineer GCP - Svenska Spel


Sista ansökningsdag:


2026-01-06

 **Placeringsort:**


Stockholm eller Visby - Hybrid

**Avtalsperiod:**


2026-02-01 1 år med option på förlängning

**Omfattning:**


35h/vecka

 **Uppdragsbeskrivning:**


Vi söker konsultstöd i form av en Platform Engineer till vår domän CPS. Konsultens huvudsakliga uppgift blir att bidra i vårt databas-team och deras uppsättning och migrering till GCP. Konsulten kommer även att spela en viktig roll i uppbyggnaden av våra interna plattformar, Termit och ITS. Rollen innebär både praktisk implementering och aktiv kompetensdelning inom organisationen. För att lyckas i denna roll och i detta uppdrag behöver konsulten även kunna demonstrera följande färdigheter:

* Utvecklad initiativförmåga och ett proaktivt arbetssätt
* Förmåga att förmedla teknik, mål och utmaningar på ett pedagogiskt sätt
* Självgående och god förmåga att planera och styra sitt egna arbete framåt
* Leveransfokuserad med förmåga att arbeta enligt överenskomna leveranser med hög kvalitet som möter överenskomna leveransdatum.

**Obligatoriska krav:**

* + Minst två (2) års erfarenhet av att ha arbetat som molntekniker, eller motsvarande inom molnplattformen GCP.
* + Minst ett (1) tidigare uppdrag från att ha arbetat i en produktionsmiljö med molnplattformen GCP.
* + Relevant akademisk utbildning eller annan dokumenterad kunskap inhämtad genom utbildningar, certifieringar eller erfarenhet.
* + Minst ett (1) tidigare uppdrag inom cloudmigrering, alternativ nyuppsättning av en cloudmiljö såsom landingzone mm.
* + God förmåga att uttrycka sig på svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.
* + Minst ett (1) tidigare uppdrag från att ha arbetat med GKE

**Mervärdeskrav:**

* + Erfarenhet och kunskap inom IaC och gärna cloud build.
* + Erfarenhet och kunskap inom crossplane.
* + Erfarenhet av att arbeta med Kubernetes
* + Erfarenhet av att arbeta med Envoy
* + Erfarenhet av att arbeta med EntraId
* + Minst ett (1) uppdrag sedan innan där man har jobbat med PKI (Public Key Infrastructure)
* + Erfarenhet av att arbeta med moderna säkerhetsprinciper som Zero Trust, Least Privelege och DevSecOps.
* + Erfarenhet av mer än ett (1) tidigare uppdrag av att ha arbetat med komplexa och transaktionsintensiva IT-miljöer mot B2C (som exempelvis inom detaljhandel, bank eller finans), med höga krav på tillgänglighet, konfidentialitet, riktighet, spårbarhet och tillgänglighet.

**KRAVMATRIS**

title: Head of Design – Data Centre Projects
description:
**Introducing evroc**


At evroc, we are building a secure, sovereign, and sustainable hyperscale cloud to reimagine the digital future of Europe. By joining our company, you have an exciting opportunity to contribute to the development of next-generation cloud services. We are seeking intellectually curious and highly motivated team members who are ready to embrace the thrilling challenge of building the first European-owned hyperscale cloud.

**Location:** Stockholm

**Job type:** Permanent position

**Join the Pioneers**


We’re looking for a visionary Head of Design to lead the engineering and design function for evroc’s hyperscale data centre projects.


You will define our design philosophy, guide multidisciplinary engineering teams, and ensure every facility meets the highest standards of performance, safety, sustainability and operability.


This is an opportunity to shape the technical blueprint of Europe’s sovereign cloud, influencing early design decisions that will impact millions of users.

**What You’ll Tackle**

* Lead and grow evroc’s multidisciplinary engineering and design team.
* Define data centre design standards, technical requirements, and engineering guidelines across all disciplines.
* Manage engineering consultancies, equipment vendors, and suppliers throughout the design process.
* Specify and customize major equipment categories, including IT racks, cooling and electrical systems.
* Ensure design decisions support constructability, commissioning, long-term operability and sustainability.
* Provide engineering input for tender packs and procurement.
* Establish engineering processes, documentation structures and review frameworks to support scalable expansion.

**Skills We Value**

* Engineering degree
* 10+ years of engineering experience, including leadership of multidisciplinary teams.
* Proven experience delivering data centre projects.
* Strong understanding of IT rack/server technology and industry trends.
* Ability to coordinate effectively with construction, operations, commissioning and procurement teams.

**Why Join evroc?**


We offer a competitive salary and equity package to attract the best. Whether it’s the cosmopolitan allure of London, the vibrant energy of Stockholm, or the Mediterranean charm of Sophia Antipolis, you’ll enjoy an inspiring work environment and a captivating local culture.


At evroc, diversity is our strength. We champion an inclusive environment where every background – ethnicity, age, gender identity, beliefs, and culture – is celebrated.


Applicants must possess a valid work permit.

title: Head of Construction – Data Centre Projects
description:
**Introducing evroc**


At evroc, we are building a secure, sovereign, and sustainable hyperscale cloud to reimagine the digital future of Europe. By joining our company, you have an exciting opportunity to contribute to the development of next-generation cloud services. **Location:** Stockholm

**Job type:** Permanent position

**Join the Pioneers**


We’re looking for an experienced Head of Construction to lead the delivery of evroc’s hyperscale data centre projects across Europe.


In this role, you will build and guide our construction and installation organisation, shape our execution model, and ensure our state-of-the-art facilities are delivered safely, on time, on budget, and to world-class quality standards.


This is a unique opportunity to join at a foundational stage and define how Europe’s sovereign cloud infrastructure is physically built.

**What You’ll Tackle**

* Lead and develop evroc’s construction & installation team across multiple international sites.
* Define construction processes, standards, and delivery frameworks for large-scale data centre builds.
* Work closely with project management, design, procurement, commissioning and project controls to ensure alignment on scope, schedule and risk.
* Manage contractors and vendors throughout tendering, selection and execution.
* Oversee on-site progress, resolve escalations, and drive performance across safety, quality, cost and schedule.
* Provide constructability input into early design and support seamless transition into commissioning and operations.
* Build a strong safety-first and quality-driven culture across all project partners.

**Skills We Value**

* 10+ years of construction experience, including work on large, complex infrastructure projects.
* Strong background in construction or installation management, preferably in mission-critical environments.
* Leadership experience building and managing international teams.
* Demonstrated experience delivering data centre projects.
* Ability to drive contractors, mitigate risks early, and maintain clarity in fast-paced environments.

**Why Join evroc?**


We offer a competitive salary and an equity package to attract the best. Whether it’s the cosmopolitan allure of London, the vibrant Stockholm, or the Mediterranean charm of Sophia Antipolis, you’re poised for an inspiring work environment and a captivating local culture!


At evroc, diversity is our strength. We champion an inclusive environment where every background - ethnicity, age, gender identity, beliefs, and culture - is celebrated.


Applicants must possess a valid work permit.

title: Data & AI Engineer
description:
**Data & AI Engineer**
======================

**Introduction**

  

At Fractal, we’re building a more connected, data-driven organization and we’re now looking for a Data & AI Engineer to help lead that journey. This role is positioned centrally in the company where you will strengthen our data foundation and proactively drive AI/BI adoption that supports better decisions across Finance, Sales, Product Development, HR, Operations, and more.


You’ll combine hands-on data engineering with a strong business mindset. The role includes building pipelines and models and you’ll work closely with stakeholders across functions to identify opportunities, translate needs into scalable solutions, and ensure that insights and AI capabilities are actually used in day-to-day work. If you enjoy working at the intersection of technology, people, and commercial impact and want to shape how Fractal uses data and AI moving forward, this is a chance to make a real difference.

 **About this role:**

  

You will join Fractal’s IT department and report directly to the IT Director. The role is key to strengthening our data architecture and accelerating AI adoption across the company. You will work in close collaboration with internal stakeholders and external partners, building integrations and AI modules that support a growing, global organization and helping to coordinate and deliver smaller cross-functional AI/BI initiatives, from scoping and alignment to implementation and rollout.


In short, this is not a role on the side of the organization. It sits at the heart of how we evolve into a stronger “OneFractal” global setup, enabling smarter ways of working through data and AI.

 **Among other, you will:**  

  

* Partner with business teams to understand data and process needs and translate them into robust pipelines, datasets, and AI-driven solutions.
* Develop AI-driven modules and applications that make complex data accessible and actionable.
* Build and maintain reliable data pipelines from ERP, PLM, HR and other systems using APIs.
* Structure, transform, and load data into Microsoft Fabric Lakehouse/Data Warehouse.
* Ensure high data quality, consistency, scalability, and reliability across integrations.
* Coordinate smaller AI/BI projects that involve multiple departments, ensuring alignment, progress, and adoption.
* Explore and implement solutions using Copilot Studio and related Microsoft AI tools.
* Prototype new AI use cases together with the IT Director and relevant departments.
* Collaborate with external partners on architecture, standards, and best practices.
* Produce clear documentation and support knowledge transfer across the organization.

**To succeed in this role, you:**

* Understand REST APIs, JSON, and authentication methods.


* Have strong programming skills in Python and SQL.


* Know data modeling and data-warehouse concepts (Microsoft Fabric or Azure Synapse is a plus).


* Have a genuine interest in AI technologies (LLMs, Copilot Studio, LangChain or similar).


* Bring experience working with data pipelines and cloud environments.


* Hold a Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science/Data Engineering or equivalent practical experience.


* Communicate well and enjoy working closely with non-technical stakeholders.


* Can deliver technical solutions that create measurable business value.


* Are fluent in English (spoken and written) and have basic proficiency in Swedish.

  



Bonus Points If You Have:  

*Experience working with ERP/PLM data structures (especially Business Central or Windchill), Power BI model awareness, or notebooks in Python/Spark*


Personal skills:


To thrive at Fractal, you’re curious and self-driven, with a strong desire to explore new tools and approaches. You work in a structured, reliable way and pay attention to details that make solutions robust over time. You’re collaborative and communicative, able to translate between technical possibilities and business needs. You enjoy ownership, take initiative, and have a documentation-oriented mindset. Most importantly, you bring energy and alignment with Fractal’s values: **People, Performance, and Passion.**


What we offer you:


You’ll join a truly global workplace with an open, down-to-earth culture, friendly and talented colleagues, and plenty of opportunities to collaborate across teams and regions. We combine ambitious work with a lot of fun through great events, social activities, and a strong sense of community. On top of that, we offer competitive benefits and a modern, inspiring office environment that makes it easy to do your best work and enjoy the ride

*Does this sound like the role for you?*  

*You don’t need to tick every box to apply. If you have the core skills and the right mindset, we would love to get in touch.* *Don’t hesitate to submit your application – we’re excited to hear from you!*

*We welcome your application as soon as possible! Interviews are held on a rolling basis, so please don’t wait to apply. If you have any questions about the role, feel free to contact IT-director Jens Boberg jens.boberg@fractal-design.com*

title: Sales Development Representative
description:
At Two, we're transforming the world of B2B commerce by reinventing how businesses pay and get paid. Our mission is to bring the speed, simplicity, and customer experience of B2C e-commerce into the B2B space, removing friction from business transactions and unlocking growth for merchants and buyers alike.
   

  

 We combine real-time credit decisioning, seamless checkout, and advanced risk assessment to power faster, smarter, and more efficient sales. With 30% month-on-month growth and operations across Europe and the United States, we're scaling rapidly - on track to become the world's leading B2B payment solution by 2027 - and one of the next Nordic unicorns.
   

  

 Backed by top-tier investors including Sequoia Capital, Shine, LocalGlobe, Antler, and some of the world's most respected fintech angels, we've raised over €40 million in equity to date. And we're just getting started!
   

  

**About The Role**
 We're looking for ambitious and proactive Sales Development Representatives to join our Commercial team and drive growth in Sweden, Finland, Denmark, Norway, the United Kingdom or the Netherlands.
   

  

 As an SDR at Two, you'll be the first point of contact for our future customers - helping them discover the value of Two's offering and shaping our go-to-market success. You'll be responsible for generating and qualifying leads, booking discovery calls, and collaborating closely with our Sales Managers and Chief Commercial Officer to build strong regional pipelines.
   

  

 This is a fantastic opportunity to join one of Europe's most exciting fintech scale-ups and have a direct impact on our commercial success.
   

  

**Location:**
 This role is based in our office hubs in Oslo, Stockholm, or London, or fully remote from Helsinki.
   

  

**What You'll Do**
* Prospect and engage potential customers via phone, email, LinkedIn and other channels
* Qualify inbound and outbound leads and schedule discovery meetings for Sales Managers
* Build a deep understanding of Two's products, customer segments, and value propositions
* Collaborate with the wider commercial team on outreach strategy and enablement content
* Conduct market research to better identify and qualify target industries, verticals, and buyers
* Maintain accurate records of all prospect interactions in our CRM


**What We Offer**
* The opportunity to shape and scale a high-impact commercial function
* Competitive base salary + uncapped performance-based bonus
* Stock option plan
* Flexible working - remote or hybrid, depending on your preference
* Access to modern office hubs in Stockholm, Oslo, and London
* International, collaborative team and regular offsite events


**Recruitment Process**
 Our interview process is structured, fair, and designed to help you showcase your strengths.
   

  

* Screening Call (30 min)
* Case Study / Task Interview (1 hr)
* Final Interview (30-45 min)


 We aim to move quickly - most candidates complete the process within 3-4 weeks.
   

  

**Requirements**
* 0-2 years of experience in outbound sales, telemarketing, or customer-facing roles - ideally in fintech, SaaS, or B2B e-commerce
* Demonstrated track record of high performance, in professional or personal life
* Preferred: Bachelor's or master's degree in business, economics, or related fields
* Ability to handle rejection, and maintain energy through high activity levels
* Clear and structured verbal and written communication
* Self-starter who thrives in a fast-paced, scale-up environment
* Native-level fluency in Swedish, Finnish, Danish, Norwegian, English, or Dutch (depending on your location) - English is our business language


**Benefits**
* Annual allowance to spend on anything that will contribute to your mental or physical health
* Annual allowance for learning and training
* Support for a cell phone every 24 months (from your 6th month anniversary)
* Work on a cutting-edge B2B payment system, shaping the future of business to business payments
* Find your best way to work with our office-led, remote-friendly working framework!
* Work from abroad for up to 30 days per year


**Deadline: 28th of December**

title: Teknisk ledare med förändringsledningskompetens för Cloud Operations
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.
   

  

**Rollen:**
* Fungera som teknisk ledare och bollplank för teamet.
* Säkerställa att teamet arbetar enligt etablerade principer för molndrift, automation och SRE-praktiker.
* Driva förändringsledning:
* Kommunicera syfte och värde med förändringar till berörda intressenter.
* Skapa förståelse och engagemang för nya arbetssätt.
* Hantera motstånd och underlätta adoption.
* Införa strukturer för att mäta och följa upp förbättringar:
* Kvantitativa mätpunkter (t.ex. tillgänglighet, incidentreduktion, kostnadsoptimering).
* Kvalitativa insikter (teamfeedback, kundupplevelse).
* Stötta i planering och prioritering av tekniska initiativ.
* Säkerställa att säkerhetskrav och compliance följs i alla lösningar.


**Ska-krav:**
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av teknisk ledning inom molnplattformar (Azure är meriterande).
* Stark kompetens inom förändringsledning och stakeholder management.
* Förmåga att etablera mätmodeller och analysera både tekniska och organisatoriska förbättringar.
* Djup kompetens inom molnarkitektur, automatisering och CI/CD.
* Vana att facilitera workshops och kommunicera med olika nivåer i organisationen.


**Meriterande:**
* Erfarenhet av (Cloud)Ops i enterprise-kontext.
* Erfarenhet av processmodellering för drift.


**Personliga egenskaper**
* Proaktiv, strukturerad och lösningsorienterad med starkt fokus på mål.
* Förmåga att skapa tydlighet och engagemang i förändringsarbete.


**Sista ansökningdag: 16-12-2025**
**Om Oss**
 Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?
   

  

 Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Här påverkar du din egen lön som helt och hållet som baseras på ditt timpris mot kund.
   

  

 Vår lönemodell är en hybridlösning mellan en fast månadslön och en provisionsbaserad ersättning. Det innebär att din månadslön baseras på ditt timpris, fast om du mot förmodan skulle stå utan uppdrag så behåller du en grund lön fram tills vi hittat ett nytt uppdrag, bra va?
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.
   

  

 🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.
   

  

 🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.
   

  

 🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?
   

  

 🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.
   

  

 📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.
   

  

 🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?
   

  

* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.
